Attributes.description: Introduction to project management. Problem definition. Design principles and practices. Implementation techniques including circuit design, software design, solid modelling, PCBs, assembling, and packaging. Testing and evaluation. Effective presentations.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of CPEN 291, ELEC 291, ELEC 292 and two of ELEC 301, ELEC 341, ELEC 311, ELEC 342.
